ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ifboth.1 | |- ( A = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ps <-> th ) ) |
| 2 |  | ifboth.2 | |- ( B = if ( ph , A , B ) -> ( ch <-> th ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_simpll | |- ( ( ( ps /\ ch ) /\ ph ) -> ps ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simplr | |- ( ( ( ps /\ ch ) /\ -. ph ) -> ch ) |
| 5 | 1, 2, 3, 4 | #P_ifbothda | |- ( ( ps /\ ch ) -> th ) |
